Uses of Package
android.view.animation

Packages that use android.view.animation
android.view Provides classes that expose basic user interface classes that handle screen layout and interaction with the user. 
android.view.animation Provides classes that handle tweened animations. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Classes in android.view.animation used by android.view
Animation
          Abstraction for an Animation that can be applied to Views, Surfaces, or other objects.
Animation.AnimationListener
          An animation listener receives notifications from an animation.
LayoutAnimationController
          A layout animation controller is used to animated a layout's, or a view group's, children.
LayoutAnimationController.AnimationParameters
          The set of parameters that has to be attached to each view contained in the view group animated by the layout animation controller.
Transformation
          Defines the transformation to be applied at one point in time of an Animation.
 

Classes in android.view.animation used by android.view.animation
Animation
          Abstraction for an Animation that can be applied to Views, Surfaces, or other objects.
Animation.AnimationListener
          An animation listener receives notifications from an animation.
Animation.Description
          Utility class to parse a string description of a size.
Interpolator
          An interpolator defines the rate of change of an animation.
LayoutAnimationController
          A layout animation controller is used to animated a layout's, or a view group's, children.
LayoutAnimationController.AnimationParameters
          The set of parameters that has to be attached to each view contained in the view group animated by the layout animation controller.
Transformation
          Defines the transformation to be applied at one point in time of an Animation.
